description:
Goku is still recovering from his previous fight, but Caulifla has ambitions that only Goku can help her achieve. The two fighters quickly gain power in this Saiyan vs. Saiyan blitz!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kiki Toshite! Sentoukyou Saiyajin Battle Futatabi!!
With Great Joy! The Repeat Battle-Crazy Saiyan Fight!!
嬉々として! 戦闘狂サイヤ人バトル再び!!
